name: A. Worms Evolution
statement:
Professor Vasechkin is studying evolution of worms. Recently he put
forward hypotheses that all worms evolve by division. There are forms of
worms. Worms of these forms have lengths , , ..., . To prove his theory,
professor needs to find 3 different forms that the length of the first
form is equal to sum of lengths of the other two forms. Help him to do
this.
